config.title: EspPlayer
config.description: If you need help with configuration, look here: https://github.com/dscao/espplayer

data.name: Player Name
data.espplay: Play service name or mqtt topic (eg: /mrdiynotifier/play)
data.espstop: Stop playing the service name or mqtt topic (eg:/mrdiynotifier/stop)

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration is allowed.

data.espvol: Volume control service or mqtt theme, Set volume control, leave blank or None if none.
data.espwan: wan play the audio url, leave blank or auto if auto.

user.description: which takes effect after reloading the service or restarting after modification
